sentences.sContent: This kind of personnel 'spillover, ' far more than sharing individual technologies, has been key to thriving innovation ecosystems like Silicon Valley.
sentences.sContent_eng: This kind of personnel 'spillover, ' far more than sharing individual technologies, has been key to thriving innovation ecosystems like Silicon Valley.
sentences.sCn: 这类人员“溢出”是推动硅谷这样的创新之地发展的关键，甚至比分享具体的技术重要得多。

words.tran: 溢出，溅出；溢出量；摔下；小塞子
